title: The New Urge Reader 4: Erotic Fiction by New Women Writers
description: Featuring 17 extraordinary women writers revealing their most intimate stories. This is feminist fiction at its most provocative — guaranteed to unsettle, excite, amuse, transport, and arouse readers. Jeanette Bradley, Karina Bush, Debra Di Blasi, Dana Duren, Eurydice, Petra Anne Hawk, Elna Holst, E. E. King, Amy Kurman, Hélène Lavelle, Lilianne Milgrom, Grace Murray, Su Orwell, Giorgia Pavlidou, Marina Rubin, Kim Vodicka, E. H. Warrington.
author: Various
